    RBMapOfHasUniqueId<K extends HasUniqueId<K>,​V>
    An immutable map from HasUniqueId to any value.

    Utility functions dealing with RBMapsOfHasUniqueId.
    RBSetOfHasUniqueId<V extends HasUniqueId<V>>
    A set of items (of the same type <V>) that implement HasUniqueId<V>, which can be retrieved just by their UniqueId.
    RBSetsOfHasUniqueId
    Utilities dealing with RBSetOfHasUniqueId.
    SimpleHumanReadableLabel
    A human-readable label used to document our output.
    SmartFormatter
    This class is to help exception messages automatically print information about the Symbol corresponding to an InstrumentId, without the caller needing to do anything special.
    SmartFormatterHelper
    This class is to help exception messages automatically print information about the Symbol corresponding to an InstrumentId, without the caller needing to do anything special.
    Strings
    Various versions of Java's String.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) methods, with the advantage that Strings.format(java.lang.String, java.lang.Object...) doesn't throw an exception if the format doesn't match its arguments.
    TestHasUniqueId
    This class is for test purposes only, so we will not have to rely on some business logic object that implements HasUniqueId.
    UniqueId<T>
    This is basically a string, except that using a separate class makes the semantics a bit more explicit.
    UniqueIdOrItem<T extends HasUniqueId<T>>
    Represents either an object of type T, or an ID of that object.
